messages.subject: Re: Time Alone????
messages.msgSnippet: I really think this is funny...my kids are in their teens and I watch my 2yr old grandson..hubby works 3rd trick so I m alone at night with a house of teens
messages.messageBody:
I really think this is funny...my kids are in their teens and I watch
my 2yr old grandson..hubby works 3rd trick so I'm alone at night with a
house of teens that think my bedroom is a sitting room for them ,in the
a.m the grandson thinks he has to sleep with grand dad right next to
him...forget us talking then with him and 2 homeschooling and not
including boyfriends ,girlfriends, just friends......then another comes
home at 3 and grandson's dadda stops by to see little one before he
goes to work(3pm to 3 am shift)little ones "momma" picks him up at 5:30
except on Fri then its 7pm ...But it never fails ...Wed all the kids
are out of here by 5:30pm...we try to have that our date
night..."momma" always calls for something and usually within an hr of
leaving here...We decided that maybe we will get time alone when they
all move out and we move somewhere with no phone or maybe not even a
road



--- Thomas and Nanci Kuykendall <tn-k4of5@...> wrote:
> From: Thomas and Nanci Kuykendall
> <tn-k4of5@...>
>
> At 11:26 AM 6/2/99 EDT, you wrote:
> >From: JandJBC@...
> >
> >Tanya,
> > I had to laugh about the time alone with husband
> bit.......mine works
> >nights so we NEVER have time alone!
>
> Hi all,
>
> With two babies at home, the youngest still trying
> to learn that he really
> can sleep through the night, I can't even go to the
> bathroom by myself. I
> answer my email in fits and starts as I referee the
> sometimes chaotic, and
> often messy, circus around here. With kids who are
> still in diapers, can't
> feed or clothe themselves, and are still learning
> how to play alone
> themselves my only hope for a few minutes to myself
> is when they are taking
> their nap (like now.) Thank goodness for that!!
>
> Nanci K.
>
>

messages.subject: Re: Time Alone????
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hi all, With two babies at home, the youngest still trying to learn that he really can sleep through the night, I can t even go to the bathroom by myself.
messages.messageBody:
At 11:26 AM 6/2/99 EDT, you wrote:
>From: JandJBC@...
>
>Tanya,
> I had to laugh about the time alone with husband bit.......mine works
>nights so we NEVER have time alone!

Hi all,

With two babies at home, the youngest still trying to learn that he really
can sleep through the night, I can't even go to the bathroom by myself. I
answer my email in fits and starts as I referee the sometimes chaotic, and
often messy, circus around here. With kids who are still in diapers, can't
feed or clothe themselves, and are still learning how to play alone
themselves my only hope for a few minutes to myself is when they are taking
their nap (like now.) Thank goodness for that!!

Nanci K.
